  • Uses of BitArray in importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.core

    Classes in importedImplementations.SanguptaBloom.bloomfilter.core that implement BitArray
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FileBackedBitArray
    An implementation of BitArray that uses a normal random file to persist all changes synchronously for the underlying bit array.
    class 
    JavaBitSetArray
    A BitArray implementation that uses the standard Java BitSet as the underlying implementation.
    class 
    MMapFileBackedBitArray
    An implementation of BitArray that uses a memory-mapped file to persist all changes synchronously for the underlying bit array.
